title: Chest system is not working?
body:
So I just got an S from playing Support Orianna and I didn't get a chest, even though my profile page says I have 3 available to claim. Over the past week, I've had 2 games where my premade also got and S and S-

Can someone explain to me why the heck this is?

replies.body: It looks like you've already received a chest for Orianna this season.  Per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide, you can only obtain one chest per champion per season.  You should be able to obtain another with her in the next season.  I hope that helps clear things up!
Oooooohhhh i thought the free chest per week and the champion chest things were separate. Thanks for clearing it up :)
